amendment.description: Amendment requires claimants to provide additional disclosure information in any pre-suit notification to establish a willful infringement claim.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part A of House Report 113-283 to require claimants to provide additional disclosure information in any pre-suit notification to establish a willful infringement claim.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Polis amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Polis.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Polis amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
